description: Can follow simple instructions and provide static answers; no memory or abstraction.
Maintains short-term context, recognizes patterns, but lacks long-term memory or deep reasoning.
Supports modular reasoning and project context; retains scoped long-term memory; cannot generalize across domains.
Operates in distributed fashion; supports agent delegation, scoped memory access, and cross-context synthesis within limits.
No agent may modify core user data or project rules without explicit confirmation protocols.
